title: Amazon Translate
description: Provides translation between English and one of six languages, or between one of the six languages and English.

InternalServerException.description: An internal server error occurred. Retry your request.
InternalServerException.title: InternalServerException

ServiceUnavailableException.description: Amazon Translate is unavailable. Retry your request later.
ServiceUnavailableException.title: ServiceUnavailableException

TextSizeLimitExceededException.description: The size of the input text exceeds the length constraint for the Text field. Try again with a shorter text.
TextSizeLimitExceededException.title: TextSizeLimitExceededException

TooManyRequestsException.description: The number of requests exceeds the limit. Resubmit your request later.
TooManyRequestsException.title: TooManyRequestsException

SourceLanguageCode.description: One of the supported language codes for the source text. If the TargetLanguageCode is not "en", the SourceLanguageCode must be "en".

TargetLanguageCode.description: One of the supported language codes for the target text. If the SourceLanguageCode is not "en", the TargetLanguageCode must be "en".

SourceLanguageCode.description: The language code for the language of the input text.

TargetLanguageCode.description: The language code for the language of the translated text.

TranslatedText.description: The text translated into the target language.

UnsupportedLanguagePairException.description: Amazon Translate cannot translate input text in the source language into this target language. For more information, see how-to-error-msg.
UnsupportedLanguagePairException.title: UnsupportedLanguagePairException
